parks.name: Busch Gardens Tampa Bay
parks.subtitle: Your Guide to a Carb-Conscious Day on Safari

menuItems.name: Bourbon Chicken
menuItems.description: Sweet and savory bourbon-glazed chicken served with fried rice or lo mein.

menuItems.name: Orange Chicken
menuItems.description: Crispy battered chicken tossed in sweet orange sauce, served with fried rice.

menuItems.name: Beef and Broccoli
menuItems.description: Wok-cooked sliced beef with broccoli in savory sauce, served with fried rice.

menuItems.name: Chicken Caesar Salad Wrap
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken with romaine lettuce and Caesar dressing wrapped in a flour tortilla.

menuItems.name: Chicken Fajitas
menuItems.description: Seasoned grilled chicken with sauteed peppers and onions, served with tortillas, rice, and beans.

menuItems.name: Beef Nachos
menuItems.description: Tortilla chips loaded with seasoned ground beef, queso, jalapenos, sour cream, and pico de gallo.

menuItems.name: Plant-Based Burger
menuItems.description: Plant-based patty on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and onion.

menuItems.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menuItems.description: Freshly baked pizza topped with pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.

menuItems.name: Stir Fry Veggies with Fried Rice
menuItems.description: Wok-tossed seasonal vegetables in a savory sauce, served with fried rice.

menuItems.name: Zambia Sampler
menuItems.description: A combination platter of St. Louis ribs, smoked brisket, and BBQ chicken served with fries.

menuItems.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
menuItems.description: Slow-smoked pulled pork with hickory and oak wood, served on a bun with mac and cheese.

menuItems.name: Smoked Chicken
menuItems.description: Hickory-smoked half chicken served with seasoned fries.

menuItems.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Beef patty topped with bacon, lettuce, pickles, and cheese, served with seasoned fries.

menuItems.name: Plant-Based Burger
menuItems.description: Plant-based patty on a bun with lettuce, tomato, and onion, served with seasoned fries.

menuItems.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken breast on a toasted bun, served with seasoned fries.

menuItems.name: Chicken Tenders
menuItems.description: Hand-breaded crispy chicken tenders served with seasoned fries.

menuItems.name: Crispy Chicken Tender Garden Salad
menuItems.description: Mixed greens topped with crispy breaded chicken tenders and dressing.

menuItems.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menuItems.description: Freshly baked pizza with pepperoni and mozzarella, with panoramic Serengeti views.

menuItems.name: Cheese Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic cheese pizza with mozzarella on a freshly baked crust.

menuItems.name: Gluten-Free Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Gluten-free crust topped with marinara, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

menuItems.name: Classic Bacon Cheddar Dog
menuItems.description: Bacon-wrapped hot dog with cheese sauce, mustard, and caramelized onion.

menuItems.name: Smokehouse Dog
menuItems.description: Smoked sausage topped with pulled pork, BBQ sauce, and coleslaw on a soft roll.

menuItems.name: The Dragon Dog
menuItems.description: Hot dog with pepper jack cheese, onion, salsa, fried jalapeno, and sour cream.

menuItems.name: Pretzel Dog with Beer Cheese
menuItems.description: A hot dog wrapped in soft pretzel dough, served with warm beer cheese dip.

menuItems.name: Jumbo Cinnamon Sugar Pretzel
menuItems.description: Jumbo soft pretzel coated in cinnamon sugar, served with cream cheese icing.

menuItems.name: Draft Beer Flight
menuItems.description: A selection of craft, import, and domestic draft beers on tap with waterfront views.
